name: Tainted (Fandible)
description:
Tainted is a solo journaling game focused on telling a story of personal horror as a person is slowly transformed into something inhuman. Within seven entries, your character will undergo a metamorphosis using the roll of the dice to help add random elements to their writing.

Tainted was created by Jesus Ariel Rodriguez of the Fandible Tabletop Roleplaying Podcast
